items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with GDPR

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search for others by name or username
Users can send and accept friend requests
Users can follow others without mutual confirmation
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 10,000 connections per user

notes: The requirement is broad; assumptions were made about core social features such as activity sharing and friend/follower systems. Further clarification needed on additional social interactions like challenges or groups.
